content: **knitted jumper in drops cotton light the piece is worked top down with round yoke/raglan relief-pattern and short sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #lavendersway drops design pattern cluster-144 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-500-550-600 g colour 51 lavender frost **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
